about_the_game:
Color Defense is an idle/clicker game with a tower defense theme.
You can choose between different towers and upgrades to survive as long as you can.
You unlock prime points depending on your kills and Evo points for reaching wave 1000+. Upgrade your towers and get as strong as you can.

- 11 maps and 2 challenge map (on release day)
- 12 enemies (4 different colors and 3 different types)
- 2 Boss enemies
- 4 traps
- 12 towers (4 different colors and 3 different types)
- 4 color gem plants
- 7 different tower upgrades
- 5 different trap upgrades
- 126 Prime upgrades
- 13 evo upgrades
- 4 local buffs
- 4 event buffs
- 7 timed buffs
- 4 attack pets
- 2 idle upgrade pets
- skilltree
- steam achievements
- steam highscores

Choose a map, build your defense and gain prime points everytime you reset or die. These points can be spend to upgrade your base, traps or towers and beat a higher wave. After 1000+ waves you can evolve and reset the whole game to get evo points which you can use to buy permanent unlocks. During the whole game you can increase your account level to unlock higher upgrade max levels, skillpoints and more drop. New maps can be unllocked with with other modifiers which are harder but also reward more evopoints.

We are developing the game further and add more features and maps in future updates.

Choose a map, build your defense and gain prime points everytime you reset or die. These points can be spend to upgrade your base, traps or towers and beat a higher wave. After 1000+ waves you can evolve and reset the whole game to get evo points which you can use to buy permanent unlocks. name: Color Defense

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista,7,8,8.1,10 (64BIT)
  • Processor: Quadcore or higher
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 or higher
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista,7,8,8.1,10 (64BIT)
  • Processor: Quadcore or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 or higher
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

short_description: Color Defense is an idle/clicker game with a tower defense theme. You can choose between different towers and upgrades to survive as long as you can.....
